variables.variable:
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print "Calculating errors for Particle Velocity in A-B convergence test" a_error_x = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] a_error_y = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print a_error_x print a_error_y print b_error_x print b_error_y
ab_ratio_x = a_error_x / b_error_x ab_ratio_y = a_error_y / b_error_y ab_ratio_particle = [log(ab_ratio_x, 2), log(ab_ratio_y, 2)]
print "Calculating errors for Fluid Velocity in A-B convergence test" a_error_x = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] a_error_y = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print a_error_x print a_error_y print b_error_x print b_error_y
ab_ratio_x = a_error_x / b_error_x ab_ratio_y = a_error_y / b_error_y ab_ratio_fluid = [log(ab_ratio_x, 2), log(ab_ratio_y, 2)]
ab_convergence_vel = [ab_ratio_particle, ab_ratio_fluid]

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print "Calculating errors for common Pressure in A-B convergence test" a_error = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Fluid"]["PressureAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["PressureAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1]
print a_error print b_error
ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_p = log(ab_ratio, 2)

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print "Calculating errors for CompressibleContinuityResidual in A-B convergence test" a_error = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Fluid"]["CompressibleContinuityResidualAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["CompressibleContinuityResidualAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1]
print a_error print b_error
ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_compressiblecontinuityresidual = log(ab_ratio, 2)

ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_ie_particle = log(ab_ratio, 2)

print a_error print b_error
ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_ie_fluid = log(ab_ratio, 2)

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print "Calculating errors for Fluid Density in A-B convergence test" a_error = stat("MMS_A.stat")["Fluid"]["DensityAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["DensityAbsoluteDifference"]["l2norm"][-1]

ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_density = log(ab_ratio, 2)

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print "Calculating errors for Particle Velocity in B-C convergence test" b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_x = stat("MMS_C.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_y = stat("MMS_C.stat")["Particle"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print b_error_x print b_error_y print c_error_x print c_error_y
bc_ratio_x = b_error_x / c_error_x bc_ratio_y = b_error_y / c_error_y bc_ratio_particle = [log(bc_ratio_x, 2), log(bc_ratio_y, 2)]
print "Calculating errors for Fluid Velocity in B-C convergence test" b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_x = stat("MMS_C.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%1"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_y = stat("MMS_C.stat")["Fluid"]["VelocityAbsoluteDifference%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print b_error_x print b_error_y print c_error_x print c_error_y
bc_ratio_x = b_error_x / c_error_x bc_ratio_y = b_error_y / c_error_y bc_ratio_fluid = [log(bc_ratio_x, 2), log(bc_ratio_y, 2)]
bc_convergence_vel = [bc_ratio_particle, bc_ratio_fluid]
